original_text: And Saul and all the people that were with him assembled themselves, and they came to the battle: and, behold, every man's sword was against his fellow, and there was a very great discomfiture.
korean_text: 사울과 그와 함께 한 모든 백성이 모여 전장에 가서 본즉 블레셋 사람들이 각각 칼로 자기의 동무들을 치므로 크게 혼란하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Saul and all the people that were with him assembled themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 사울과 그와 함께 있는 모든 백성이 모였고

sentences.original_text: and they came to the battle
and, behold, every man's sword was against his fellow
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 각 사람의 칼이 그의 동료를 겨누었고

sentences.original_text: and there was a very great discomfiture
